name: Vignettes (itch) (Figglewatts)
description:
Vignettes (vee·nyets) presents numerous dream sketches for you to explore. Scenes from the past, spaces lost in time, times lost in space. Reach inner peace and complete your dream diary. Controls
  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look
  • Shift to sprint
  • Click on things in the bedroom to interact with them
  • Press escape when dreaming to force yourself to wake up

Vignettes will automatically save your progress.

If you wish to reset your progress, you can do so by deleting the following file:

Windows: C:\Users\<userprofile>\AppData\LocalLow\Figglewatts\Vignettes\Saves\save.sav OS X: ~/Library/Application Support/Figglewatts/Vignettes/Saves/save.sav Linux: ~/.config/unity3d/Figglewatts/Vignettes/Saves/save.sav Soundtrack

Vignettes was made for LSDJAM 2020.

If you like dream exploration, check out LSD Revamped!
